sys_ux_client_script.name: onClickCreate

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_828fb5dd47c47110f61b4c6d826d434c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Create New Model">e18f75dd47c47110f61b4c6d826d43fc</macroponent><name>onClickCreate</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedOption = api.state.selectedOption;
    if (selectedOption === 'cmdb_model_bundle') {
        route(api, {
            "route": "record",
            "redirect": "true",
            "fields": {
                "table": "cmdb_model",
                "sysId": "-1"
            },
            "params": {
                "query": "bundle=true^cmdb_model_category=bundle"
            }
        });
    } else if (selectedOption === 'cmdb_model_pallet') {
        route(api, {
            "route": "record",
            "redirect": "true",
            "fields": {
                "table": "cmdb_model",
                "sysId": "-1"
            },
            "params": {
                "query": "cmdb_model_category=pallet"
            }
        });
    } else {
        route(api, {
            "route": "record",
            "redirect": "true",
            "fields": {
                "table": selectedOption,
                "sysId": "-1"
            }
        });
    }
    function route(api, params) {
        helpers.modal.close();
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', params);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-14 14:46:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>828fb5dd47c47110f61b4c6d826d434c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onClickCreate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_828fb5dd47c47110f61b4c6d826d434c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-14 14:46:07</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
